pageContent: Care Aspirants,Do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the Law.Update 13, these are files that slipped through the cracks of the last three updates, plus some more Tantra. Changed “Abuses of Breeze and Gunther” in the A.'.A.'. folder to “State of the Caliphate”.A.'.A.'.>PhilosophyAdded an edition of I Ching that I didn't loathe. It will get it's own folder if I can start finding the books that I want on the subject.Added Rivers of Life by Forlong (Comparative Religion).Added Western Esotericism and Rituals of InitiationA.'.A.'.>State of the CaliphateAdded the election minutes for William Breeze, and a transcript of the “Caliphate Tapes” which is a long conversation between Martin Starr, Breeze, McMurtry, and Wasserman, plus a few more, shortly before the death of McMurtry, detailing succession protocol.A.'.A.'.>ThelemaAdded Chapman's Desert Rose and The Urn to compliment Blood of the Saints.Golden DawnAdded the abridged By Names and Images, The Rosicrucian Seer, and Golden Dawn Correspondence Courses.KabbalahAdded Mystical Heritage of the Children of AbrahamYogaMoved Kiss of the Yogini to Yoga proper. Yoga>SaivismAdded Ganapati Upanishad w/TranslationYoga>ShaktaAdded Matrikabheda Tantra, The Yoni Tantra, The Power of the Impure: Transgression, Violence and Secrecy in Bengali Shakta Tantra, and The Magic of Kali.That's it. Short update. Previous acquisition list still stands.Love is the law, love under will.Fraternally,Kynokephalos
